EmailTemplate.name: 202001_BK_Website_AeroVue-Touch-Product-Page_mc.Thank You Email - Sales
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest! We will be contacting you shortly about your AeroVue Touch request.
For complete part and pricing information, including installation cost, please contact your BendixKing dealer: https://bkx.bendixking.com/Dealer-Directory/ <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/Dealer-Directory/]]>
Other ways to contact us: US and Canada: 1-855-250-7027 Worldwide: 1-505-903-6148 Sales: sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com]]> Technical Support: techsupport@bendixking.com <[[mailto:techsupport@bendixking.com]]> Exchanges (SPEX): spex-bgaorders@honeywell.com <[[mailto:spex-bgaorders@honeywell.com]]> Repairs: olatheservicecenter@honeywell.com <[[mailto:olatheservicecenter@honeywell.com]]> Wingman Services: dsa@honeywell.com <[[mailto:dsa@honeywell.com]]> Publications: pubs@bendixking.com <[[mailto:pubs@bendixking.com]]> Warranty registrations and claims: warranty@bendixking.com <[[mailto:warranty@bendixking.com]]>
